name: Whac-A-Pumpkin
description:
Do you like the game "Whac-A-Mole"? Have you ever wanted to smash some pumpkins without getting dirty? 

Welcome to "Whac-A-Pumpkin"! Smash those pesky pumpkins when they show up and gather as many points as possible to push your highscore!

This game was created for the One Minute Game Jam.
